content: lion brand pattern #l80068 and #l70049 skill level easy beginner+ materials --lion brand® shawl in a cake art #455 - 1 cake of 302 prism 1 color a and 2 cakes of 304 lotus blossom color b --crochet hook i-9 5 5 mm --large-eyed blunt needle gauge -- 1 ripple = about 3-3/4 in 9 5 cm be sure to check your gauge notes 1 shawl is worked in one piece in a ripple crochet pattern the ripple pattern is easy to do but it s important to remember that you may need to work several row before the ripple pattern becomes clear 2 the ripple is created by skipping 2 sts to form valleys and working 3 double_crochet to form peaks in each row take care to skip the 2 sts in each valley and work 3 double_crochet in the center double_crochet of each 3-double_crochet peak of the previous row 3 to change yarn color work last st of old color to last yarn over yarn over with new color and draw through all loops on hook to complete st proceed with new color fasten_off old color 4 for those who find a visual helpful we ve included a stitch diagram available as l70049 1 and l80068 2 1 http //www lionbrand com/barbizon-shawl-l70049 html shopgate_redirect=1 2 http //www lionbrand com/barbizon-shawl-l80068 html shopgate_redirect=1
